messages.subject: Re: Terlingua, TX
messages.msgSnippet: I am sorry.  I wasn t clear. Active daily reader and diligently trying to continue to grow as a life learner with six year old special needs son. When we were
messages.messageBody:
I am sorry. I wasn't clear. Active
daily reader
and diligently trying to continue to grow as a life learner with six year old
special needs
son. When we were looking to relocate we were searching for other like minded
individuals
and families in various locations in the U.S. We just moved to above mentioned
area.
My desire was simply to share that we were in a new place and hoping
that for
anyone else looking to relocate or vacation that they might consider this lovely
area. I
apologize for the confusion. My hope is by actively and intentionally reaching
out to others
I can help expand the supportive community of like minded individuals and
families in my new geographical area. I do not want to create confusion or
detract from
the focus or purpose of this group so I
will be discontinuing any such further similar
types of posts on this
group. My apologies. Joanne O'N.

messages.subject: Re: Terlingua, TX
messages.msgSnippet: For more information,  please join one or both of the following yahoo groups: 1) Terlingua Ranch This is a place for all that are interested in The Ranch, the
messages.messageBody:
For more information, please join one or both of the following yahoo groups:

1) Terlingua Ranch

This is a place for all that are interested in The Ranch, the Big Bend Area, Terlingua, Study
Butte, and any other areas in the Trans-Pecos. This is the place to exchange information,
ideas and pleasant conversations whether you are a property owner or just interested in
the area. Everyone is welcome to post links to interesting websites, photos, or even
recipes. Check out the link section where you will find some helpful information.


Group Email Addresses
Post message:
terlinguaranch@yahoogroups.com
Subscribe:
terlinguaranch-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Unsubscribe:
terlinguaranch-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
List owner:
terlinguaranch-owner@yahoogroups.com


2) Texas Outback


A Texas Outback board (formerly CheapCamping cheap camping ),for those who crisscross
the Greater Big Bend
seeking adventure! Looking for the best Mexican food, bookstores,
campsites, scenic views, or watering holes? Learn where the best
place to buy prescription meds or dental work in Mexico. For those who
come for a week or a lifetime. Dedicated to those who love America's
best kept secret, the Texas Outback. Let's talk Terlingua, Study Butte, Lajitas, Marathon,
Marfa, Van Horn, Alpine, Fort Stockton, Big Bend National Park, hot springs, Big Bend State
Park, Presidio, Ft. Davis, Pecos, Sanderson, Del Rio and all points near and in between.

Let's discuss tents, vehicle living, cheap shelters and other camping, traveling and living
interests and let's talk about the ins and outs of buying West Texas land.


Group Email Addresses
Post message:
TexasOutback@yahoogroups.com
Subscribe:
TexasOutback-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Unsubscribe:
TexasOutback-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
List owner:
TexasOutback-owner@yahoogroups.com

Please also continue to feel free to e-mail me privately. :)

Joanne O'N.
seagullcaller@...

messages.subject: Terlingua, TX
messages.msgSnippet: We have bought land in a beautiful area.  We look forward to staying connected to this group. Anyone looking for a rural, slow pace, inexpensive, easy
messages.messageBody:
We have bought land in a beautiful area. We look forward to staying connected to this group.

Anyone looking for a rural, slow pace, inexpensive, easy requirements for home schooling
location might want to look here:

www.terlinguaranch.com

www.poatri.org

www.visitbigbend.com

Income opportunities are limited so one must be creative :)

Joanne
dh: Charlie
